modName: FPS Crosshair plus optional No Enemy Info
summary: High contrast FPS crosshair and/or remove enemy health, red dot and detection eye.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that replaces the old grey crosshair with a high contrast FPS crosshair. It also (optionally) removes the enemy health bar, [detected] eye and red dots on the compass.

Update 1.1:

No longer shows enemy name when using No Enemy Info. White dot crosshair options added.


Install:

Choose your option and copy the files to your Skyrim\\Data folder.


Uninstall: 

Delete hudmenu.gfx in your Skyrim\\Data\\Interface\\Exported folder.
author: kruftwark
